name: Hungry Bearz
description:
Hungry Bearz is a simple & very challenging and addictive game!!

Money Bag from top, rotate bearz to catch the Money Bag they like, share the love with Bearz...

Try to beat your high score and challenge your friends on Game Center and have fun :)

Features
~~~~~~~~~~~~
- iOS 9 or later support
- Awesome Gameplay music
- Better sound effects
- Fun levels
- Game Center intergration
- Social sharing of your score.

=====

Hungry Bearz is only compatible with devices running iOS 9 or later.

=====
Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at - jareddasilva1@gmail.com
